Text:
anybody watch tv and catch that Samuel Adams beer commercial with the sweet song playing in the background?  that's this guy. very talented individual that writes, composes, sings, and produces his own music. various genres of songs, too. some alternative sounds, acoustic, folk, hip hop... real talent.

if you'll be getting this for your own listening entertainment please seed back - sharing is caring!
This guy is amazing.  I can't find Happy Days Are Here To Stay anywhere though... :(
